text:
e="preserve">NARAL Pro-Choice America, or just NARAL, is an American non-profit organization. It is a 501(c)(4) group. It engages in lobbying and political action. It also works to go against restrictions on abortion and expand access to it, birth control, paid parental leave and pregnancy discriminations.
NARAL is associated with the NARAL Pro-Choice America Foundation, a 501(c)(3) organization. They're also associated with the NARAL Pro-Choice America PAC, a political action committee.
NARAL was founded in 1969. It is the oldest abortion rights advocacy group in the United States.
